main event: A round white-bluish object was observed hovering over Bellingham, Washington, for about 4 minutes before fading away in the northeastern direction.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on July 5, 1965, and lasted for 4 minutes,The object was reported to have a round shape and bluish-white color,The conclusion drawn was that the object was likely a satellite, either Echo II or another bright satellite,The observation was made visually from the ground without any physical evidence left behind,There were no photographs taken during the sighting.
